content.body: The bit that is tripping me up, is the liveness of a set that only has one object in it: this seems to only refer to the keptAliveList and weakRef-oblivious executions. So it then only clears weakrefs that have that one object as its target.
content.formatted_body: The bit that is tripping me up, is the liveness of a set that only has one object in it: this seems to only refer to the keptAliveList and weakRef-oblivious executions. So it then only clears weakrefs that have that one object as its target.

content.body: But other weakRefs could allow that object to be reached, without mention of them being cleared
Apart from in that last note
